comments.author: konovalov_88
comments.body: Checked out this roll. Got a win. Thank you.I noticed that it does not allow connecting several different wallets, apparently an anti-abuse system so that people do not try to spin spins from different wallets.

comments.author: Prophed
comments.body: Quote from: konovalov_88 on August 18, 2023, 05:23:59 AMChecked out this roll. Got a win. Thank you.I noticed that it does not allow connecting several different wallets, apparently an anti-abuse system so that people do not try to spin spins from different wallets.Yes, I checked it too, it works.I connected the main wallet and got a small win, then I tried to connect 2 wallets from the same computer, and nothing happened. Apparently the developers of this site turned out to be smarter. But I'm still happy with my win. I wish you all good luck!

comments.author: Don Pedro Dinero
comments.body: What a rubbish presentation of roulette. As if it wasn't crude enough already, we have a whole series of fake newbies trying to convince us how cool it is. If you want to promote roulette, there are better ways to do it, like buying a copper membership (it's cheap) so you can put images like it should be in the OP. You can also give an incentive for reputable forum users to do serious reviews, and for that you have campaign managers who can handle it (one of them has commented on the thread).
